item.title: SmartDiabetes
item.description: SMARTDIABETES solution enhances diabetes care through a data-driven digital ecosystem. It integrates the SocialDiabetes tool for patient self-management and remote monitoring across three clinical sites. The project creates a value-based healthcare reimbursement model and delivers a comprehensive operating blueprint for healthcare organizations, including care pathways, user support, and training strategies. By prioritizing adoption, acceptance, and sustainability, SMARTDIABETES puts patients and care providers at the center, ensuring long-term impact through collaboration among clinical, academic, and business experts.

Value
item.description: The VALUE solution helps turn digital health transformation into reality. Defeating patient disease and restoring patient health is the dominant concept driving healthcare delivery in most facilities. The growing prevalence of chronic diseases among the population is jeopardising the sustainability of the current healthcare system. VALUE is a solution aimed at healthcare providers to deliver healthcare services that provide value to patients while maintaining sustainable healthcare.
